name: Xianyun
source: Reward for inviting Xianyun to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: White Clouds at Dawn
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. Creates <color=#FFFFFFFF>Skyladder</color>. This character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>Driftcloud Wave</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Anemo DMG. Creates Skyladder. This character gains Driftcloud Wave.

skills.name: Stars Gather at Dusk
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. Heals all allied characters for 1 HP. Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115102]</color> in your Hand.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115102]</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S1151021]</color>)
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>. Heals all allied characters for 1 HP. Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Starwicker</color> in your Hand.\n(Characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Starwicker</color> equipped can use the Technique: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Adeptal Assistance</color>)
skills.description:
Deals 1 Anemo DMG. Heals all allied characters for 1 HP. Creates 1 Starwicker in your Hand.
(Characters with Starwicker equipped can use the Technique: Adeptal Assistance)
